Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

package it.polimi.ingsw.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.controller
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.util
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.view
     
  • Class
    Description
    Bag
    This class represents the Bag, which contains all the tiles that have not been placed on the board yet.
    Board
    This class represents the Board, which contains all the tiles picked from the Bag and where the user can take tiles to place on its personal Bookshelf
    Bookshelf
    This class represents the Bookshelf, which contains all the tiles that the user has taken from the Board.
    CommonGoalCard
    This is an abstract class that generically represents the CommonGoalCard with its scores and description.
    CommonGoalCard1_2
    Class used for Common Goals 1 and 2, where the goal is achieved if there are at least 'numOfGroups' groups of n tiles (where n=dimension) in the bookshelf
    CommonGoalCard10
    This class represents the common goal card number 10 that observes the following description: Two lines each formed by 5 different types of tiles.One line can show the same or a different combination of the other lines.
    CommonGoalCard11
    Common goal card that represents the following description: Five tiles of the same type disposed as X
    CommonGoalCard12
    This class represents the common goal card number 12 that observes the following description: Five columns of increasing or decreasing height.Starting from the first column on the left or on the right, each next column must be made of exactly one more tile.
    CommonGoalCard3
    Common goal card that represents the following description: Four tiles of the same type placed on the corners of the bookshelf
    CommonGoalCard4
    This class represents the common goal card number 4 that observes the following description: Two groups each containing 4 tiles of the same type in a 2x2 square.
    CommonGoalCard5
    This class represents the common goal card number 5 that observes the following description: Three columns each formed by 6 tiles of maximum three different types.
    CommonGoalCard6
    Common goal card that represents the following description: At least eight tiles of the same type on the bookshelf, regardless of their position
    CommonGoalCard7
    This class represents the common goal card number 7 that observes the following description: Five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal.
    CommonGoalCard8
    Common goal card that represents the following description: Four complete lines formed by one, two or three different types of tiles
    CommonGoalCard9
    This class represents the common goal card number 9 that observes the following description: Two columns each formed by six different types of tiles.
    ItemTile
    This class represents the ItemTile which is a tile with its types.
    ItemTileType
    The general types of the tiles
    MyShelfieGame
    This class represents the game
    PersonalGoalCard
    This class represents the PersonalGoalCard, each player has one, and the goal is to have as many tiles as possible on the personal bookshelf of the same type and color represented on the card.
    Player
    This class represent the Player
